original_text: I did learn this: God made people to do what is right. But people have chosen their own way to do things. I did learn this: God made people to do what is right. But people have chosen their own way to do things. I did learn this: God made people to do what is right. But people have chosen their own way to do things. I did learn this: God made people to do what is right. But people have chosen their own way to do things. I did learn this:
korean_text: 내가 깨달은 것은 오직 이것이라 곧 하나님은 사람을 정직하게 지으셨으나 사람이 많은 꾀들을 낸 것이니라

sentences.original_text: God made people to do what is right.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 사람들이 옳은 일을 하도록 만드셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: But people have chosen their own way to do things.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 사람들은 자기들의 방식으로 일하기로 선택했습니다.

sentences.original_text: God made people to do what is right.
